rooms.description: A welcoming open space designed to adhere to Vastu principles, promoting positive energy.
Centrally located living area with ample natural light and traditional Kerala-style wooden finishes. Adjacent to the kitchen and dining space.
Traditional design with functional layout, incorporating local materials like granite and tiles; includes a small pantry area.
Spacious master bedroom featuring Kerala-style interiors, private balcony overlooking the garden.
Comfortable secondary bedroom with traditional window grills and ventilation for optimal air circulation as per Vastu norms.
Compact, well-ventilated bathroom adhering to local building codes and traditional design elements.
Dedicated gym space with proper ventilation and natural lighting; designed for fitness equipment, ensuring privacy.

openings.description: Located at the southern side to promote positive energy flow according to Vastu Shastra.
Traditional wooden window designs distributed evenly across facades to enhance natural light and ventilation, aligned with Kerala architecture.
Open space adjoining Master Bedroom providing an outdoor viewing area; designed in keeping with traditional aesthetics.
